text: This video is... 30 seconds long, what's that? It's 30 seconds long, we don't have time to get along because it's 30 seconds long, you all have many things to do, that's why I'm being short with you so I've decided not to bore you. By being 30 seconds long, yes this is 30 seconds long, we don't have time to wear a thong or smoke a thong or play a ping pong, it's not matter what I do or what I wish to say to you, it's all for nothing, because you see the limitation set on me of being 30 seconds long.
